turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah. I would like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool and what type pizzas do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Let's see. I want three large pizzas, all with gluten-free free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. One, I want a veggie lover pizza. Second pizza, I want extra cheese, pepperoni, and pineapple. And for the third pizza I want diced tomatoes, mushrooms, and extra cheese as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for the 3rd pizza, did you want regular tomatoes or sun dried tomatoes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. So to confirm, you want 3 large pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 1 veggie lovers, 1 with extra cheese, pepperoni and pineapple, and 1 with regular diced tomatoes, mushrooms and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56 is your total. Should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order to bella lunas. The food will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy.
